summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET MALIBU. WHILE OPERATING THE VEHICLE, "POWER STEERING ASSIST' MOMENTARILY DISPLAYED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. BOB PULTE CHEVROLET (909 COLUMBUS AVE, LEBANON, OH) AND THE MANUFACTURER WERE NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, BUT NO ASSISTANCE WAS OFFERED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 140,000.
